IRS990.MissionDescription: Near North Health Service Corporation (NNHSC) exists to improve the health and well-being of the people and community it serves. It operates programs and services using community primary care concepts, emphasizing prevention of illness and the promotion of healthy lifestyles. Services provided by NNHSC will focus on the medically underserved, and will be sensitive to the cultural and linguistic needs of the people it serves. Acknowledging that the environmental, social, and cultural factors influence one's health, its programs will empower individuals to be healthy through education and skill building. We will advocate for safe and healthy communities.NNHSC will play a role in educating and training medical and health care professionals in order to assure the accomplishment of its objective.The composition of the Board of Directors of NNHSC will be representative of the community it serves.
IRS990.Description: WINFIELD MOODY HEALTH CENTER-SERVING THE RESIDENTS OF THE CABRINI-GREEN, NEAR NORTH AND WEST TOWN COMMUNITIES.

Activity2.Description: KOMED HOLMAN HEALTH CENTER-SERVING THE RESIDENTS OF THE MID-SOUTH SIDE OF CHICAGO, INCLUDING KENWOOD/OAKLAND GRAND BOULEVARD, HYDE PARK AND CHATHAM.

Activity3.Description: LOUISE LANDAU HEALTH CENTER-SERVING THE RESIDENTS OF SOUTHWEST AND HUMBOLT PARK.

ActivityOther.Description: COTTAGE VIEW HEALTH CENTER-SERVING THE RESIDENTS OF GRAND BOULEVARD
UPTOWN CENTER-SERVING THE RESIDENTS OF UPTOWN

Form990ScheduleKPartI.DescriptionOfPurpose: RENOVATION, ACQUISITION AND CONSTRUCTION OF NNHC FACILITIES

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THERE IS AN INTERNAL REVIEW PROCESS WHICH IS PERFORMED BY THE DIRECTOR OF FINANCE AND THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, SUBSEQUENT TO THAT REVIEW, THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE FINANCE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD, WHO THEN SUBMITS THE REPORT TO THE ENTIRE BOARD FOR APPROVAL. A COPY OF THE REPORT IS KEPT ON RECORD FOR PUBLIC REVIEW SHOULD THERE BE SUCH A REQUEST.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ALL STAFF AND BOARD MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT EVERY YEAR, WHICH IS KEPT IN EACH STAFF AND BOARD MEMBERS FILES. DISCLOSURE OF CONFLICT INTEREST POLICY QUESTION IS PRESENTED TO EVERY STAFF OR BOARD MEMBER DURING THE RECRUITING OR HIRING PROCESS. FUTHERMORE, AT ANY JUNCTURE WHEN MAJOR DECISIONS ARE ABOUT TO BE MADE, INDIVIDUALS ARE ASKED TO DISCLOSE ANY CONFLICTS THAT MAY EXIST.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE COMPENSATION FOR STAFF IS BASED ON THE RESULTS OF ANNUAL REVIEWS CONDUCTED BY THE HEALTHCARE TRADE ASSOCIATIONS. THE SURVEY IS USED AS A GUIDE IN DETERMINING THE CORPORATION'S SALARY SCHEDULE IN COMPARISON TO ITS INDUSTRY.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
